extendedInfo.description: Get ready to take the battle to the enemy and win the war! iBomber Defense Pacific is the latest game in the hugely successful iBomber series. Moveout to the Pacific as you fight a whole new enemy in an effort to secure territory on the Pacific Rim. **Runs beautifully on tablets**GENRE PERFECTION iBomber Defense Pacific takes tower defense to a whole new level. Feel like you're right there and part of the incredible action as you use the new deep strategy options to protect your base. Building on the success of its predecessors, iBomber Defense Pacific has all-new tactics, all-new strategies, all-new maps, all-new weapons, and all-new enemies. MUCH IS AT STAKE With so much to play for in iBomber Defense Pacific, youâll never be bored. Whether itâs placing turrets, analysing the enemy attack options, perfecting your strategy, looking for hidden targets, bombing the enemy from above, repairing units, or destroying an enemy outpost youâll always have something to do. IF LOOKS COULD KILL Tower defense has never looked so good. Luscious jungle greens, incredible water effects, jaw-dropping explosions, intricately designed vehicles and turrets come together to make on of the best looking strategy games in years. Get some earphones on and become immersed in the battle with amazing warzone sound effects.

reviews.title: Great tower defense title
reviews.comment: One of the best TD games I have found on the marketplace. Definitely worth picking up. Great graphics and gameplay.
reviews.author: Craig Maxwell

reviews.title: It wont download
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to download the 116mb file and it locks up at various stages and will not finish downloading. Very Disappointed.  I played this on my iphone and loved it. Uninstalling!!!
reviews.author: Ron Smith

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I love this game and I don\'t know why it\'s not as popular as it is on the iOS store
reviews.author: James Hierath

reviews.title: Won\'t Start
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to start this since purchase, but It cannot download content from the server.  Highly Disappointing.
reviews.author: Albert Myles

reviews.title: Will not run!
reviews.comment: I loved this game on its. But, I get server error 5002. Please fix.  Update 03-16-13 still broken.
reviews.author: Chris Webster

reviews.title: The best td game for android
reviews.comment: I just wish they would make the first one available too
reviews.author: alan nixon

reviews.comment: Awesome. Best tower defense game by far. Wish they\'d bring out part 1 :/
reviews.author: James Naulls

reviews.title: Still broke
reviews.comment: Well I bought it on sale but I have yet to play this game and so far its been 3 days.  I wish i could play but its still getting a \"internal server error\". plz dont think this game is bad, it just needs fixed.
reviews.author: Reid Sohlden

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: The game is a good game. It won\'t boot up on my phone anymore need to get the app fixed!
reviews.author: Randall Troupe

reviews.title: should have read the reviews
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t load and I\'m too late for my refund.  Fraud at it\'s finest.
reviews.author: Sean Erik

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Does not work. Says to go to ea website but still doesn\'t help.
reviews.author: Donovan Johnson

reviews.title: Fun and exciting game!
reviews.comment: The game is great and all but I would like to see maps that are more open and bigger. Especially more weapons and objectives. A cool feature would be is to add randomly generated maps to play on.
reviews.author: Hubert Fortier

reviews.title: This was the one game I missed from iOS
reviews.comment: This was the one game I missed from iOS. I\'m glad it\'s here.
reviews.author: And Apps

reviews.title: Addictive and fun!
reviews.comment: Played on the iPad forever, so happy I now have it on my Nexus 7!  Only one complaint/question, where are the rocket bombs?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good tower Defense.
reviews.comment: Really good tower Defense game with a nice progression and difficulty ramp.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun Gameplay
reviews.comment: I really like the graphics and WWII theme. I would like the option of pinch to view as the units are very small.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Will not boot.
reviews.comment: Directs you to Web for  support.  I have a better solution. Refund which I am doing now
reviews.author: Burwil Chance

reviews.title: :D my wish came true
reviews.comment: This is the game I\'ve been wanting since I got an Android.  Works perfectly on my S3. Just need more Chillingo/ClickGamer games like Helsings Fire,  The Quest,  Knights on Rush and Sword of Fargoal Legends
reviews.author: A Google User
